title: Afghan people must go back: Khawaja Asif
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 7 (APP):Minister for Defense Khawaja Muhammad Asif on Monday said that Afghan people should go back to their country.
Afghanistan is a peaceful country and a large number of Afghan citizen should leave Pakistan now, he said while talking to a private television channel. Many Afghan people are doing illegal business here, he said.
In reply to a question, he said, we have diplomatic relations with Afghanistan. To a question about terrorism, he said
Army and Police have given unprecedented sacrifices while fighting war on terror.
Pakistanâ€™s economy cannot bear the burden of Afghan people living here, he stated.
Commenting on the politics of Chief Minister Khyber Pakhtunkhawa, he said that the PTI leader should focus on improving the security issues of KP and avoid criticizing the national institutions.
